features: FORMULATED FOR KIDS – Our natural, plant-based kids’ deodorant is specifically formulated for kids & teens. Kiddos are active and can work up a sweat at recess or running around the house with friends or siblings. Fresh Monster Deodorant for girls, boys, tweens, and teens glides on clear and leaves no white marks.

NATURAL DEODORANT FOR KIDS & TEENS – Fresh Monster Deodorant for girls and boys is all natural and free from toxins. We never use aluminum, parabens, triclosan, phthalates, or other harsh chemicals and irritants. Fresh Monster Natural Deodorant for Kids and Teens provides long lasting, superior odor protection for active kids safely with our aluminum-free deodorant.

ALL DAY PROTECTION – This trusted deodorant offers 24-hour protection without any harsh chemicals so you can feel good about what is going on your kid’s skin. Our formula uses baking soda, tapioca starch, and other natural deodorizers to deliver all-day odor protection. Simply apply to clean dry skin for great protection all day.

HYPOALLERGENIC & DERMATOLOGIST TESTED – A gentle yet effective deodorant, Fresh Monster deodorant is suitable for even the most sensitive skin. Our dermatologist-tested deodorant has been tested. Our products are eco-friendly, vegan, have never been tested on animals, and are made in the U.S.A.

REFRESHING SCENT – Keep your kiddos stink-free all day long with the Beach Breeze scent. It smells great while protecting against underarm odor all day. Made with baking soda, tapioca starch, and other natural deodorizers. Your kids will love this vibrant, fun and unique scent, and enjoy using it daily.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fresh Monster All-Natural Deodorant for Kids and Teens Made just for kids, our gentle deodorant is made from natural, plant-based ingredients. Perfect for active kiddos who love to play and have fun! It goes on smoothly without leaving any white marks. Suitable for girls, boys, tweens, and teens.

All Natural and Effective Aluminum and Paraben Free Kids and Teen Natural Deodorant Our Fresh Monster Kids Natural Deodorant offers all-day odor protection with a delightful scent. It contains baking soda, tapioca starch, and other natural deodorizers. Kids will adore the vibrant, fun, and unique fragrance, making it a daily must-have.

Attention all parents of active kids and cool teens! We've got something epic for you - Fresh Monster Natural Deodorant! This powerhouse will keep kids fresh and confident without aluminum or parabens. Get ready to unleash the freshness.

Designed for Kids Toxin-Free Deodorant Fresh Monster Natural Kids and Teens' Deodorant - A toxin-free solution for your young ones! Our plant-based formula is free from sulfates, parabens, phthalates, dyes, synthetic fragrances, BPA, gluten, and soy. Let them experience freshness without harmful chemicals. The smooth application is formulated with all natural shea butter and coconut oil will glide on smooth, ethout feeling sticky or leaving white marks or residue.

Our Fresh Monster Brand Promise Say goodbye to itching and irritated skin! Our hypoallergenic products are gentle and perfect for sensitive skin. No toxins, sulfates, parabens, phthalates, dyes, synthetic fragrances, BPA, gluten, soy. No animal testing; PETA-certified Vegan & Cruelty-Free! Experience the magic of Fresh Monster! Handcrafted by a women-led company in the USA. Our planet-friendly products are safe and super effective. Experience the essence of nature! Our products are scented with natural fruit & botanical extracts, clearly labeled—no hidden "fragrance" secrets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent for kids
reviews.reviewText: I love this deodorant! It’s for my 7-year-old girl, who, I noticed, wasn’t smelling so great by the time I picked her up from school. At her young age, I don’t feel right having her use a “regular” deodorant with aluminum/chemicals so I knew I wanted a more natural option. I was overwhelmed with all of the choices, read tons of reviews, and decided to try this. It seems to work well, goes on clear, doesn’t irritate her skin, and lasts throughout the day. The best part is that it smells really good! It has a sweet, fruity scent that, I feel, is appropriate for a little girl - not the typical perfumey scents that adult deodorants usually have. I’m happy I tried this and will continue to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FINALLY something that works!
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: We are in the middle of the summer, going to playgrounds like it’s nobody’s business, and this deodorant is STILL doing a great job! Highly recommend!Let me start off by saying this product is great. I have tried many options and I have been searching for literally years.This product is for my oldest daughter, who just turned 6. Our search for safe deodorants started back when she was 2. Yes, she has had pretty strong body odor since she was 2! I think part of the problem is she sweats more than average and is always on the move, and she just runs warmer than average. We have had her checked out by her doctor, and there’s nothing wrong other than that she happens to have strong body odor.So we started our journey to find a safe deodorant for her. We started with Lume and I THOUGHT I had found my answer, as it worked great for me and also for her…until after a few months when it seemed like we had grown a tolerance to it and our bodies stopped responding to it. I thought perhaps our batch had gone bad, so I ordered brand new Lume and we didn’t respond to the brand new tube either. Back to the drawing board.I have tried Native and Tom’s. Both of those brands only added a scent to her body odor, so it was body odor mixed with whatever scent the tube was. More money wasted.Until I found Fresh Monster! We have been using this for a few months now and have not had any issues. The scent is a little more like citrus and gummy bears and smells SO clean and fresh. My daughter bathes every other day, and she is able to just apply this the first day after bathing and it lasts until she bathes next.I will update my review after the summer months come, but my expectations are high. To say I’m relieved is such an understatement; I feel so hopeful knowing we have found a solution before kids are at that age where they could be mean to someone for being the “smelly kid.” She has great hygiene and unfortunately just has a body odor issue. 🤷🏻‍♀️ So glad we have found a solution!Adding that I have received no benefit for writing this review; I’m just so happy we found this stuff!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: My toddler has been asking to put on deodorant for a while now so I finally bought her some of her own. The scent is great, I’m glad it is natural. I prefer items that mg toddler uses to be as natural or chemical free as possible. It’s a bit expensive but will last for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for my 9yr old daughter
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has been needing deodorant since she turned 7. She’s 9 now. We’ve tried several store bought ones that claimed to be organic, aluminum free, natural etc. but she would always be irritated on her under arms. She started developing a rash even after I switched product’s multiple times. I finally did a cleanse & just stopped using deodorant on her for 4 days to let her pits heal using aquaphor every night. After they healed, & rash went away I tried this new brand & she has not had any irritation at all! She puts it on at night after showering then a small layer in the morning & lasts her all through PE & gymnastics. She’s very active & sweats a whole lot! We’ve been using it 3 weeks now & it’s working great. This helped decrease her wetness & controls her odor. She was getting embarrassed because none of her other deodorants would last.. she would have to apply more after PE, but this is a light fresh fruity scent & she loves it! So happy to find something that works for my sensitive girl. & it gives her more confidence through her daily activities! Will be using this brand with all 4 of my kids! Only negative thing, is it is a creamy so it comes on like lotion almost, but a little goes a long way so it doesn’t take much. She said it feels a little gooey at night but it dries quickly & she’s used to it now. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5. But will continue to buy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have tried all of the natural deodorants in the world! Haha! But seriously!😳 This is the best deodorant by far. I was a little skeptical, but it has kept me smelling great even in the midst of the worst summer heat. It’s non-irritating and works amazing! Give it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product works
reviews.reviewText: I like how gentle it is for my daughter, it smells good, and it keeps her fresh all day. I couldn’t have asked for a better product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST KIDS DEODRANT! HANDS DOWN!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased a lot of kids deodorant and were disappointed in the quality each time until I found this. It smells great, last all day and does not irritate my sensitive skinned child. This is a little pricey, but I am telling you it is the only one I have found that my kid does not smell like an onion 30 min after applying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 9 year old son needed to start wearing deodorant and we wanted something safe and not harsh and this one is perfect. He loves the smell and it works really well. I'll definitely continue to order this one!
I got this for my 8 year old. Definitely works, leaves pits smelling like candy. Kiddo has been using it about 6 months with no irritation. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 10 years old daughter has started to use it about 3 month ago. I highly recommend it. A lot better than other ones. It has a nice smell and it is staying there all day.

Ottimo deodorante pensato per i bambini, con ingredienti naturali e molto delicato per la pelle dei più piccoli. È un mese che lo stiamo usando, devo dire che è perfettamente tollerato da mia figlia e l'azione deodorante è perfetta, anche con outfit sintetici.
Les produits sont bios et adaptés à la peau des enfants
It works,bit expensive though. But it's worth it 👌.
